summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TradeAI Pro application - backend APIs and frontend functionality tested with excellent results

ui_bugs.issue: Modal dialogs block navigation clicks when open - user cannot navigate between pages until modal is closed

passed_tests: Backend API test suite: 19/19 tests passed (100% pass rate)
Dashboard loads with all stats, equity chart, recent signals, trades, and daily challenges
AI Analysis page - form inputs working, analysis initiated successfully
Signals page - signals generated and displayed with confidence levels, TP/SL data
Journal page - trade logging form accessible and functional
Market page - live market data displayed with forex, crypto, metals prices and active sessions
Academy page - lessons organized by modules, progress tracking, lesson completion modal
Challenges page - daily and weekly challenges displayed with XP rewards and completion tracking
Profile page - user stats, achievements, streak milestones, account details displayed
Navigation sidebar working correctly for all pages
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay z-index issue - modal backgrounds are intercepting pointer events and blocking navigation. Consider adding modal close on navigation or improving overlay event handling.
